      • withinInterval

        public static boolean withinInterval​(float[] array1,
                                     float[] array2,
                                     float tolerace)
        This method allow us to find whether one array is within interval of another
        Parameters:
        array1 - the detected rgb value
        array2 - the standard rgb value of certain can
        tolerace - which means the max difference the value in the two arrays can have
        Returns:
        boolean whether the value in the two arrays are close enough
